description.narrative: CLOSED N Policy and System support lation, plans and budgets review ed /developed to facilitate progress towards MDGs attainment Nationally as well as in selected districts., which contributes to Child Health, Immunization, Policy Advocacy â€“ Urban, Civil Society, Parliament, Environment, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: The Government of Iraq (GoI) has participatory and accountable policy framework and implementation mechanisms for the delivery of quality basic services at all levels.
